name: The world is falling
description:
The world is falling, the sky is falling, stop it now!

My YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCiz0rEK2tcfDAwWyZpvTakQ

Controls: A and D or Left Arrow and Right Arrow, Jump - W or Up Arrow or Space,

Jump into the wall and press jump button to perform the wall jump

Source code: https://github.com/InfiniteCoder01/TheWorldIsFalling
